channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Natural Magnum"

item.title: Useful?
item.content:encoded: I would discuss the usability of this perk. By the time I have let's say 80 awesome to buy level 2 (and let's be frank - there are other perks way more important to get early - stamina, range for example) - I will most probably have at least several Z-skill on lv 5. The only use I see ofr this is when I have absolutely no idea where to spend awesome and I buy lv3 to get one more Z-reward out of each map. Then I hoard those Z-rewards for 200 stamina each when I need it for Sannin runs or whatever.

item.title: A note suggestion.
item.content:encoded: You might want to mention that this bonus can help earning the 28 Dayrolls later trophy, which rewards more Awesome points than the first level of this power costs! It also makes the It's A Trick trophy much easier to get as well.
